<span id="cb2-7"><a href="#cb2-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">host =</span> <span class="fu">Sys.getenv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;POSTGRES_HOST&quot;</span>, diades.atlas<span class="sc">:::</span><span class="fu">get_golem_config</span>(<span class="st">&quot;POSTGRES_HOST&quot;</span>)),</span>
<span id="cb2-8"><a href="#cb2-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">dbname =</span> <span class="fu">Sys.getenv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;POSTGRES_DBNAME&quot;</span>, diades.atlas<span class="sc">:::</span><span class="fu">get_golem_config</span>(<span class="st">&quot;POSTGRES_DBNAME&quot;</span>)),</span>
<span id="cb2-9"><a href="#cb2-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">port =</span> <span class="fu">Sys.getenv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;POSTGRES_PORT&quot;</span>, diades.atlas<span class="sc">:::</span><span class="fu">get_golem_config</span>(<span class="st">&quot;POSTGRES_PORT&quot;</span>)),</span>
<span id="cb2-10"><a href="#cb2-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">user =</span> <span class="fu">Sys.getenv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;POSTGRES_USER&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas_r&quot;</span>),</span>
<span id="cb2-11"><a href="#cb2-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">password =</span> <span class="fu">Sys.getenv</span>(<span class="st">&quot;POSTGRES_PASS&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;diadesPassword&quot;</span>),</span>
<span id="cb2-12"><a href="#cb2-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="at">options =</span> <span class="st">&quot;-c search_path=diadesatlas&quot;</span></span>

<span id="cb2-744"><a href="#cb2-744" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   category_name &lt;chr&gt;, latin_name &lt;chr&gt;,</span></span>
<span id="cb2-745"><a href="#cb2-745" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   simplified_name &lt;chr&gt;,</span></span>
<span id="cb2-746"><a href="#cb2-746" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   fish_name &lt;chr&gt;, …</span></span>
<span id="cb2-747"><a href="#cb2-747" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; # Source:   table&lt;&quot;diadesatlas&quot;.&quot;v_iucn&quot;&gt;</span></span>
<span id="cb2-748"><a href="#cb2-748" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   [?? x 7]</span></span>

<span id="cb2-753"><a href="#cb2-753" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;  1          6 Alosa alosa   A. alosa       </span></span>

<span id="cb2-756"><a href="#cb2-756" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;  4         13 Anguilla ang… A. anguilla    </span></span>
<span id="cb2-757"><a href="#cb2-757" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;  5         18 Lampetra flu… L. fluviatilis </span></span>
<span id="cb2-758"><a href="#cb2-758" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;  6         21 Petromyzon m… P. marinus     </span></span>
<span id="cb2-759"><a href="#cb2-759" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;  7         25 Salmo salar   S. salar       </span></span>
<span id="cb2-760"><a href="#cb2-760" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;  8         26 Salmo trutta  S. trutta      </span></span>
<span id="cb2-761"><a href="#cb2-761" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;  9         20 Osmerus eper… O. eperlanus   </span></span>
<span id="cb2-762"><a href="#cb2-762" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 10         19 Chelon ramada C. ramada      </span></span>
<span id="cb2-763"><a href="#cb2-763" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; # … with more rows, and 4 more variables:</span></span>
<span id="cb2-764"><a href="#cb2-764" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   english_name &lt;chr&gt;,</span></span>
<span id="cb2-765"><a href="#cb2-765" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   iucn_classification_code &lt;chr&gt;,</span></span>
<span id="cb2-766"><a href="#cb2-766" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   iucn_level_code &lt;chr&gt;,</span></span>
<span id="cb2-767"><a href="#cb2-767" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   iucn_level_name &lt;chr&gt;</span></span>
<span id="cb2-768"><a href="#cb2-768" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb2-769"><a href="#cb2-769" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>casestudy <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;casestudy&quot;</span>))</span>
<span id="cb2-770"><a href="#cb2-770" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>casestudy</span>
<span id="cb2-771"><a href="#cb2-771" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; # Source:  </span></span>
<span id="cb2-772"><a href="#cb2-772" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   table&lt;&quot;diadesatlas&quot;.&quot;casestudy&quot;&gt; [?? x</span></span>
<span id="cb2-773"><a href="#cb2-773" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   4]</span></span>
<span id="cb2-774"><a href="#cb2-774" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; # Database: postgres</span></span>
<span id="cb2-775"><a href="#cb2-775" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; #   [diadesatlas_owner@localhost:5432/diades]</span></span>
<span id="cb2-776"><a href="#cb2-776" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;   casestudy_id casestudy_name   publishable</span></span>
<span id="cb2-777"><a href="#cb2-777" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt;          &lt;int&gt; &lt;chr&gt;            &lt;lgl&gt;      </span></span>
<span id="cb2-778"><a href="#cb2-778" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 1            3 Normand-Breton … TRUE       </span></span>
<span id="cb2-779"><a href="#cb2-779" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 2            4 Loire            TRUE       </span></span>
<span id="cb2-780"><a href="#cb2-780" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 3            6 Gipuzcoan        TRUE       </span></span>
<span id="cb2-781"><a href="#cb2-781" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 4            1 Waterford Harbo… TRUE       </span></span>
<span id="cb2-782"><a href="#cb2-782" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 5            9 Mondego          TRUE       </span></span>
<span id="cb2-783"><a href="#cb2-783" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 6            8 Minho            TRUE       </span></span>
<span id="cb2-784"><a href="#cb2-784" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#&gt; 7            2 Tamar-Taff-Frome TRUE       </span></span>

<div id="create-connection" class="section level3">
<h3>Create connection</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb3"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb3-1"><a href="#cb3-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>my_dm <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">dm_from_src</span>(con, <span class="at">schema =</span> <span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="at">learn_keys =</span> <span class="cn">TRUE</span>)</span>
<span id="cb3-2"><a href="#cb3-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>my_dm</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
<div id="function-to-collect-data" class="section level3">
<h3>Function to collect data</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb4"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb4-1"><a href="#cb4-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># empty</span></span>
<span id="cb4-2"><a href="#cb4-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># dplyr::tbl(con, dbplyr::in_schema(&quot;diadesatlas&quot;, &quot;cices51&quot;)) %&gt;% collect()</span></span>
<span id="cb4-3"><a href="#cb4-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># services ?</span></span>
<span id="cb4-4"><a href="#cb4-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># dplyr::tbl(con, dbplyr::in_schema(&quot;diadesatlas&quot;, &quot;cices&quot;)) %&gt;% collect()</span></span>
<span id="cb4-5"><a href="#cb4-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># services new</span></span>
<span id="cb4-6"><a href="#cb4-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;es_diades&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-7"><a href="#cb4-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># geometry of all basin</span></span>
<span id="cb4-8"><a href="#cb4-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;basin_outlet&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-9"><a href="#cb4-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Model results over the years</span></span>
<span id="cb4-10"><a href="#cb4-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;hybrid_model_result&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-11"><a href="#cb4-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Abundance of species in a given basin ove the years</span></span>
<span id="cb4-12"><a href="#cb4-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;abundance&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-13"><a href="#cb4-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># ?</span></span>
<span id="cb4-14"><a href="#cb4-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;climatic_model&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-15"><a href="#cb4-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># List of all basins</span></span>
<span id="cb4-16"><a href="#cb4-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;basin&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-17"><a href="#cb4-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb4-18"><a href="#cb4-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># List of basin for case_study</span></span>
<span id="cb4-19"><a href="#cb4-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;casestudy&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-20"><a href="#cb4-20" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># List of basins id for case_study</span></span>
<span id="cb4-21"><a href="#cb4-21" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;casestudy_basin&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-22"><a href="#cb4-22" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># List of ecosystem services</span></span>
<span id="cb4-23"><a href="#cb4-23" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;ecosystem_service&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-24"><a href="#cb4-24" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;ecosystem_service_new&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb4-25"><a href="#cb4-25" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># List of species</span></span>
<span id="cb4-26"><a href="#cb4-26" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;species&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="prepare-data-for-home-page" class="section level2">
<h2>Prepare data for Home page</h2>
<div id="prepare-json-files" class="section level3">
<h3>Prepare json files</h3>
<p>Create all json data used on the home page of the app</p>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb5"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb5-1"><a href="#cb5-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># List of case studies</span></span>
<span id="cb5-2"><a href="#cb5-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>casestudy <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;casestudy&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb5-3"><a href="#cb5-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># List of the corresponding basins</span></span>
<span id="cb5-4"><a href="#cb5-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>casestudy_basin <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;casestudy_basin&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb5-5"><a href="#cb5-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Put them two together</span></span>
<span id="cb5-6"><a href="#cb5-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>cstd <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">full_join</span>(casestudy, casestudy_basin) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">filter</span>(publishable)</span>
<span id="cb5-7"><a href="#cb5-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb5-8"><a href="#cb5-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Get the features for drawing the polygons on the map</span></span>
<span id="cb5-9"><a href="#cb5-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>qry <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="st">&quot;SELECT ST_Transform(diadesatlas.basin_outlet.simplified_geom, 4326) as geom, basin_id as basin_id FROM diadesatlas.basin_outlet&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb5-10"><a href="#cb5-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb5-11"><a href="#cb5-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># i then read as an sf object</span></span>
<span id="cb5-12"><a href="#cb5-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>pols <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> sf<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">st_read</span>(con, <span class="at">query =</span> qry, <span class="at">geom =</span> <span class="st">&quot;geom&quot;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-13"><a href="#cb5-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">filter</span>(basin_id <span class="sc">%in%</span> casestudy_basin<span class="sc">$</span>basin_id) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-14"><a href="#cb5-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">left_join</span>(cstd)</span>
<span id="cb5-15"><a href="#cb5-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>pols <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-16"><a href="#cb5-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  geojson<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">as.geojson</span>() <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-17"><a href="#cb5-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  geojson<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">geo_write</span>(here<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">here</span>(<span class="st">&quot;inst/casestudy.json&quot;</span>))</span>
<span id="cb5-18"><a href="#cb5-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb5-19"><a href="#cb5-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># List of ecosystem services</span></span>
<span id="cb5-20"><a href="#cb5-20" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>ecosystems <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;ecosystem_service&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb5-21"><a href="#cb5-21" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>ecosystems <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-22"><a href="#cb5-22" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">filter</span>(presence <span class="sc">==</span> <span class="dv">1</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-23"><a href="#cb5-23" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  jsonlite<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">write_json</span>(here<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">here</span>(<span class="st">&quot;inst/ecosystems.json&quot;</span>))</span>
<span id="cb5-24"><a href="#cb5-24" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Services</span></span>
<span id="cb5-25"><a href="#cb5-25" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>services <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;v_ecosystemic_services&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb5-26"><a href="#cb5-26" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>services <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-27"><a href="#cb5-27" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">distinct</span>(category_id, subcategory_id, category_name, subcategory_name) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-28"><a href="#cb5-28" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">mutate</span>(</span>
<span id="cb5-29"><a href="#cb5-29" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="at">subcategory_id =</span> <span class="fu">gsub</span>(<span class="st">&quot;99&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;0&quot;</span>, subcategory_id)</span>
<span id="cb5-30"><a href="#cb5-30" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  ) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-31"><a href="#cb5-31" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">arrange</span>(</span>
<span id="cb5-32"><a href="#cb5-32" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    category_id, subcategory_id</span>
<span id="cb5-33"><a href="#cb5-33" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  ) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-34"><a href="#cb5-34" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">mutate</span>(</span>
<span id="cb5-35"><a href="#cb5-35" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>    <span class="at">subcategory_id =</span> <span class="fu">gsub</span>(<span class="st">&quot;0&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;99&quot;</span>, subcategory_id)</span>
<span id="cb5-36"><a href="#cb5-36" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  ) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-37"><a href="#cb5-37" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  jsonlite<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">write_json</span>(here<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">here</span>(<span class="st">&quot;inst/services.json&quot;</span>))</span>
<span id="cb5-38"><a href="#cb5-38" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb5-39"><a href="#cb5-39" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>eco_and_services <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="fu">full_join</span>(ecosystems, services)</span>
<span id="cb5-40"><a href="#cb5-40" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb5-41"><a href="#cb5-41" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># Species</span></span>
<span id="cb5-42"><a href="#cb5-42" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb5-43"><a href="#cb5-43" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>species <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> dplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">tbl</span>(con, dbplyr<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">in_schema</span>(<span class="st">&quot;diadesatlas&quot;</span>, <span class="st">&quot;species&quot;</span>)) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span> <span class="fu">collect</span>()</span>
<span id="cb5-44"><a href="#cb5-44" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>species <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-45"><a href="#cb5-45" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">filter</span>(species_id <span class="sc">%in%</span> ecosystems<span class="sc">$</span>species_id) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb5-46"><a href="#cb5-46" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  jsonlite<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">write_json</span>(here<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">here</span>(<span class="st">&quot;inst/species.json&quot;</span>))</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
<div id="prepare-and-test-leaflet-map" class="section level3">
<h3>Prepare and test leaflet map</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb6"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb6-1"><a href="#cb6-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># set query and reproject to EPSG:4326 for GeoJSON creation</span></span>
<span id="cb6-2"><a href="#cb6-2" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># (the real query is more involved with a bounding box etc)</span></span>
<span id="cb6-3"><a href="#cb6-3" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>qry <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> <span class="st">&quot;SELECT ST_Transform(diadesatlas.basin_outlet.simplified_geom, 4326) as geom FROM diadesatlas.basin_outlet&quot;</span></span>
<span id="cb6-4"><a href="#cb6-4" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb6-5"><a href="#cb6-5" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># i then read as an sf object</span></span>
<span id="cb6-6"><a href="#cb6-6" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>pols <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> sf<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">st_read</span>(con, <span class="at">query =</span> qry, <span class="at">geom =</span> <span class="st">&quot;geom&quot;</span>)</span>
<span id="cb6-7"><a href="#cb6-7" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb6-8"><a href="#cb6-8" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># and convert to GeoJSON</span></span>
<span id="cb6-9"><a href="#cb6-9" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>pols.js <span class="ot">&lt;-</span> geojsonio<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">geojson_json</span>(pols)</span>
<span id="cb6-10"><a href="#cb6-10" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># pols %&gt;% geojson::as.geojson() %&gt;% geojson::geo_write(&quot;plop.json&quot;)</span></span>
<span id="cb6-11"><a href="#cb6-11" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb6-12"><a href="#cb6-12" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># options(readr.default_locale=readr::locale(tz=&quot;Europe/Berlin&quot;))</span></span>
<span id="cb6-13"><a href="#cb6-13" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># df60 &lt;- get_eurostat_geospatial(resolution = 60)</span></span>
<span id="cb6-14"><a href="#cb6-14" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#</span></span>
<span id="cb6-15"><a href="#cb6-15" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># CE.sf &lt;- df60 %&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb6-16"><a href="#cb6-16" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#   dplyr::filter(LEVL_CODE == 2 &amp; CNTR_CODE %in% c(&quot;AT&quot;,&quot;CZ&quot;,&quot;DE&quot;,&quot;HU&quot;,&quot;PL&quot;,&quot;SK&quot;)) %&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb6-17"><a href="#cb6-17" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co">#   dplyr::select(NUTS_ID)</span></span>
<span id="cb6-18"><a href="#cb6-18" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb6-19"><a href="#cb6-19" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">plot</span>(pols)</span>
<span id="cb6-20"><a href="#cb6-20" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb6-21"><a href="#cb6-21" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>pols <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb6-22"><a href="#cb6-22" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">ggplot</span>() <span class="sc">+</span></span>
<span id="cb6-23"><a href="#cb6-23" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">geom_sf</span>(<span class="at">color =</span> <span class="st">&quot;black&quot;</span>, <span class="at">size =</span> <span class="fl">0.4</span>)</span>
<span id="cb6-24"><a href="#cb6-24" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb6-25"><a href="#cb6-25" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="co"># CE = sf::as_Spatial(pols)</span></span>
<span id="cb6-26"><a href="#cb6-26" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a></span>
<span id="cb6-27"><a href="#cb6-27" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a><span class="fu">leaflet</span>() <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb6-28"><a href="#cb6-28" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">addProviderTiles</span>(<span class="st">&quot;CartoDB.Positron&quot;</span>) <span class="sc">%&gt;%</span></span>
<span id="cb6-29"><a href="#cb6-29" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <span class="fu">addPolygons</span>(<span class="at">data =</span> pols, <span class="at">color =</span> <span class="st">&quot;green&quot;</span>)</span></code></pre></div>
</div>
<div id="stop-connection" class="section level3">
<h3>Stop connection</h3>
<div class="sourceCode" id="cb7"><pre class="sourceCode r"><code class="sourceCode r"><span id="cb7-1"><a href="#cb7-1" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>DBI<span class="sc">::</span><span class="fu">dbDisconnect</span>(con)</span></code></pre></div>
